title: Watch 'N' Learn: The Story of Numbers, Musical Instruments, & Telling Time
description: Three educational Watch 'N' Learn programs. The Story of Numbers: This delightful animated musical will introduce your children to the meaning of numbers and their relationship to each other. A fun way to help preschoolers and primary graders to learn arithmetic. Musical Instruments: This animated musical will teach your children all about musical instruments. Follow the story of the farmer who dreams of conducting an orchestra. His animals play instruments in a barnyard orchestra until one day the fairy god-cow comes to make his dreams come true. Telling Time: Through music and stories your child will learn the difference between day and night, and all about seconds, minutes, and hours. Recommended for Ages 3-6.
